channel.title: Uniqueness plox
channel.description:
Don't you just hate people who say that? It isn't going to be unique, it's runescape. The factor here is we can not evolve from the engine or runescape, if you want uniqueness then go to something other then a [b]runescape[/b] private server forum.
Sorry to point out the obvious but some people just are... dur...

item.title: Uniqueness plox
item.dc:creator: @Onix Onix
item.description:
@Onix wrote:

Don't you just hate people who say that? It isn't going to be unique, it's runescape. The factor here is we can not evolve from the engine or runescape, if you want uniqueness then go to something other then a runescape private server forum.

Don’t you just hate it when people say humans aren’t unique? We are all just entities; we all end up in the same place in the end. The fact here is that we can’t evolve from humans, we are all just the same.

“Because we all know that two things based off something similar is not unique.” - Taharahora, 2012.

Read full topic

item.title: Uniqueness plox
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Lin:

I don’t get why people keep saying this. Servers are nothing like RuneScape. Remakes try and bring back what RuneScape did great, but they never make it. Instead, we get servers that have custom items, special PK standards, a messed up economy that not only uses coins, but “PK points”, areas dedicated to all forms of skilling, combat, and minigames all accessible by a single no-cost click, and an overall sense of easiness. Last time I checked RuneScape wasn’t like this.

/thread

Read full topic

@sinisoul wrote:

Remakes > “Unique”

item.description:

We can make plenty of things unique off of Runescape’s client, it’s just the fact that many people would rather re-do Jagex’s mistakes rather than put effort into going the right direction with their server.

item.title: Uniqueness plox
item.dc:creator: @_s11 s1gma
item.description:
@_s11 wrote:

uniquity doesn’t have to be dictated by superficiality. using runescape’s client means you’re using runescape’s client and playing a game that looks like runescape, but one can easily develop and redefine game mechanics to make the game differ a lot from runescape itself.

Read full topic

item.title: Uniqueness plox
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Unique: having no like or equal; unparalleled; incomparable. Clearly the client IS RuneScape but the server itself is not. You can change features of the client to be unique compared to other private servers. People go for different things in a server, one key point is uniqueness in my opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: Uniqueness plox
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

my whole point is this is runescape, people dont go for uniqueness they go for… runescape… lol

how many times i have to say runescape till moparians get it?

& to be unique they would have to trash the cache and start completely over… noone has or will do that… so if you want uniqueness then go to the new moparscape site about game development… cuase honestly you wont get it here

and no matter what it’ll be runescape it’s runescape’s game engine…so… it’s runescape… always no matter what…

unless you start with notepad and code a core of your own that looks like nothing like runescape…
that’ll belong in the other moparscape forum, not the runescape private server forum…

so next time you ask about “ive seen this all before blah blah” think first… it’s because its runescape.

Read full topic

item.title: Uniqueness plox
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

But the ideas behind the server can be completely original. You don’t have to put any features that Runescape has into your own server. You can create more items, npcs, animations, games, or skills. You can do what you want to the server to make it original and unique from other servers.

Read full topic
